member.name: DCOMPOSITION_BACKFACE_VISIBILITY
member.summary: Specifies the backface visibility to be applied to a visual.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_BACKFACE_VISIBILITY.DCOMPOSITION_BACKFACE_VISIBILITY_VISIBLE
member.summary: Surfaces in this visual's sub-tree are visible regardless of transformation.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_BACKFACE_VISIBILITY.DCOMPOSITION_BACKFACE_VISIBILITY_HIDDEN
member.summary: Surfaces in this visual's sub-tree are only visible when facing the observer.

member.name: DCOMPOSITION_BACKFACE_VISIBILITY.DCOMPOSITION_BACKFACE_VISIBILITY_INHERIT
member.summary: The back face visibility is the same as that of the target visual's parent visual.
